subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: The new Swiss ski star Beat Feuz won before his home fans, capturing a World Cup downhill on the classic Lauberhorn course in Wengen, Switzerland, while Bode Miller finished fifth.
snippet: The new Swiss ski star Beat Feuz won before his home fans, capturing a World Cup downhill on the classic Lauberhorn course in Wengen, Switzerland, while Bode Miller finished fifth.
